description: Updates a channel specified by a required channel ARN or UUID.

parameters.name: Channel
parameters.description: The ARN or ID (the ARN suffix) of the channel that you want to update.

parameters.name: Destinations
parameters.description: The ARNs of event data stores that you want to log events arriving through the channel. (dict) --- Contains information about the destination receiving events. The type of destination for events arriving from a channel. For channels used for a CloudTrail Lake integration, the value is EVENT_DATA_STORE. For service-linked channels, the value is AWS_SERVICE. For channels used for a CloudTrail Lake integration, the location is the ARN of an event data store that receives events from a channel. For service-linked channels, the location is the name of the Amazon Web Services service.

nested_params.name: Type
nested_params.description: The type of destination for events arriving from a channel. For channels used for a CloudTrail Lake integration, the value is EVENT_DATA_STORE. For service-linked channels, the value is AWS_SERVICE.

nested_params.name: Location
nested_params.description: For channels used for a CloudTrail Lake integration, the location is the ARN of an event data store that receives events from a channel. For service-linked channels, the location is the name of the Amazon Web Services service.

nested_items.name: ChannelArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the channel that was updated.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the channel that was updated.

nested_items.name: Source
nested_items.description: The event source of the channel that was updated.

nested_items.name: Destinations
nested_items.description: The event data stores that log events arriving through the channel.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of destination for events arriving from a channel. For channels used for a CloudTrail Lake integration, the value is EVENT_DATA_STORE. For service-linked channels, the value is AWS_SERVICE.

nested_items.name: Location
nested_items.description: For channels used for a CloudTrail Lake integration, the location is the ARN of an event data store that receives events from a channel. For service-linked channels, the location is the name of the Amazon Web Services service.
